detectors.description: Variable Governmental.ONE_MINUTE (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#15) is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in Governmental.resetInvestment() (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#30-40):
	External calls:
	- lastInvestor.send(jackpot) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#34)
	- owner.send(this.balance - 1000000000000000000) (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- jackpot = 1000000000000000000 (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#38)
	- lastInvestmentTimestamp = 0 (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#39)
	- lastInvestor = 0 (../dataset/smartbugs-curated/dataset/time_manipulation/governmental_survey.sol#37)
